headline.main: Dodgers' Ryu Out for Season After Shoulder Surgery
headline.print_headline: Dodgers' Ryu Out for Season After Shoulder Surgery

docs.snippet: Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Ryu Hyun-jin will be sidelined for the rest of the season after having arthroscopic surgery on his troublesome left shoulder on Thursday, the Major League Baseball team said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Ryu Hyun-jin will be sidelined for the rest of the season after having arthroscopic surgery on his troublesome left shoulder on Thursday, the Major League Baseball team said.

headline.main: F.E.C. Member Says System Tilts Against Conservative Groups

docs.snippet: A Republican member of the Federal Election Commission has charged that the agency investigates more conservative campaign organizations than liberal ones....
docs.abstract: A Republican member of the Federal Election Commission has charged that the agency investigates more conservative campaign organizations than liberal ones.

headline.main: Exclusive: Iowa Bird-Flu Farms Fall Short on Containment Measures
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Iowa Bird-Flu Farms Fall Short on Containment Measures

docs.snippet: Measures to control the worst bird flu outbreak in U.S. history are not being enforced at several farms at its epicenter in northwestern Iowa, potentially increasing the risks that the disease could spread further, spot checks by Reuters show....
docs.lead_paragraph: Measures to control the worst bird flu outbreak in U.S. history are not being enforced at several farms at its epicenter in northwestern Iowa, potentially increasing the risks that the disease could spread further, spot checks by Reuters show.

headline.main: U.S. Admits Two Children Killed in Islamic State Campaign
headline.print_headline: U.S. Admits Two Children Killed in Islamic State Campaign

docs.snippet: Two children were likely killed by a U.S. air strike in Syria in November, the U.S. military said on Thursday, the first time the Pentagon has acknowledged civilian casualties since it began the air campaign against Islamic State militants in Syri...
docs.lead_paragraph: Two children were likely killed by a U.S. air strike in Syria in November, the U.S. military said on Thursday, the first time the Pentagon has acknowledged civilian casualties since it began the air campaign against Islamic State militants in Syria and Iraq.

headline.main: Prosecutors Would Face High Bar in Filing Amtrak Charges
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Would Face High Bar in Filing Amtrak Charges

docs.snippet: Prosecutors are trying to determine if the Amtrak engineer at the controls of a train that derailed in Philadelphia last week committed a crime....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors are trying to determine if the Amtrak engineer at the controls of a train that derailed in Philadelphia last week committed a crime.

headline.main: Arnaboldi Wins Epic Qualifying Match at French Open
headline.print_headline: Arnaboldi Wins Epic Qualifying Match at French Open

docs.snippet: Andrea Arnaboldi needed two days and spent four hours and 26 minutes on court to win the qualifying match featuring the most number of games in the history of the French Open on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andrea Arnaboldi needed two days and spent four hours and 26 minutes on court to win the qualifying match featuring the most number of games in the history of the French Open on Thursday.
